title: Lenovo ThinkPad X240 20AL008QUS 12.5" Touchscreen LED (IPS Technology) Ultrabook - Intel Core i7
features: i7-4600U (2 cores, 2.10GHz, 4MB cache), Intel HD Graphics 4400

description: The 12.5" ThinkPad X240 Ultrabook is thin, light, built to last, and ready for business. Power Bridge technology lets you go ten or more hours without plugging in, vPro gives you the ultimate in manageability, and plenty of other features let you take your business on the road.
